Based on your preference cues, here are some potential recommendations from this list:

1. 'Flags of Our Fathers' (2000) directed by Jerry Zaks is an epic war film that tells the story of six men who raised the flag at Iwo Jima during World War II. The film stars Rami Malek as Mr. Church, Novak Djokovic as Private First Class Iwo Ujima, Sylvester Stallone as Private First Class Joe Cration, Jason Statham as Captain Park Choon Ho, Jet Li as General Chang Zhen, Bruce Willis as General George S. Patton, and many others.
2. 'Battleship' (2012) directed by Peter Berg is a science fiction action film that tells the story of Captain Jack Anderson (played by Bruce Willis), who leads his team in the battle against an alien invasion force known as the 'Battleship'.
3. 'The Expendables 2' (2012) directed by Simon West is an action film that tells the story of a group of retired special forces soldiers led by John Mandle (played by Arnold Schwarzenegger), who go on a mission to rescue their team leader, Bill Ryan (played by Steve Coogan), from his captors.
4. 'The Twilight Saga: New Moon' (2009) directed by Chris Weeninga is a fantasy romance film that tells the story of Bella Swan (played by Kristen Stewart)), who goes on a mission to find out why her best friend, Jacob Black (played by Taylor Lautner)), has been turned into an ice monster.
